item.description:
Beautiful ladies,
The Noah's Art requests the pleasure of your company for a tea and doodle art on Friday May 10 at 7 pm. It will be a special evening to celebrate Mother's Day. You will have an opportunity to create a beautiful whimsical piece of art, enjoy company of great friends with delicious food and tea.

Please RSVP by May 1 to Olya
at 508-332-8230
or olga@noahs-art.com

This event is for moms only.

Truly yours,

Olya.

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Happy Mother's Day!
